clinical_study.brief_title: Mindfulness and Intercare Based Intervention for Physicians Burnout Reduction
clinical_study.official_title: Physicians Burnout: Cause, Consequence and Mindfulness and Intercare Based Intervention for Physicians Burnout Reduction

brief_summary.textblock: During the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID19) pandemic, many physicians have presented burnout. A range of associated factors need to be considered for effective prevention and intervention. Objective 1: To assess the association of burnout in medical doctors with individual factors, self-reported medical errors, medical leave, and demands of the work environment demand. Objective 2: to assess the effectiveness of a online mindfulness, compassion and intercare based intervention to reduce burnout.

primary_outcome.description: Burnout was evaluated with Maslach Burnout Inventory for Human Services. Continuous variable for burnout total score, emotional exhaustion, depersonalization and accomplishment. Dichotomous variable was used for burnout syndrome using two common cut-off point criteria and a new proposal.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Mindfulness, compassion and intercare based Intervention
arm_group.description: An Eight week mindfulness and intercare group online program.
Psychological support if needed. No other intervention.

intervention.description: Eight week online program based on mindfulness, compassion and intercare intervention. A two hour synchronic online session every week plus daily homework based on meditation and journaling exercises. The topics covered in the program are mindfulness meditation, cognitive behavioral therapy exercises, gratitude and acceptance, compassion and self compassion exercises, conservation of resources theory and intercare.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Physicians enrolled in the database of the medical college of Chile
Exclusion Criteria:
- Recent Grief
- Severe acute depression disorder
- Active suicidal ideation
- Active Psychosis
- Active addiction
- Post Traumatic Stres Disorder
